Text: Tozzini Freire Invitation th anniversaryAuguste Rodin Auguste Rodin was a continuously surprising artist Restless argumentative tormented he was always in search of the feeling the meaning underlying reality going beyond the perfection of shape a shape that sometimes is clearly presented and sometimes left to the imagination of the viewer To understand Rodin one has to stand before one of this Masters works letting our perception slide over all of its turns and bends discovering all of its nuances knowing that shapes change and are transformed as time elapses while allowing us to discover the artists intentions rodinlgtftsgifIt was not by chance that Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva Advogados made this choice to celebrate its th anniversary The boldness the search for ones own style the daringness the permanent questioning are part of Rodin and yet they also represent our way of feeling and carrying out our professional activity In commemoration of Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva Advogados th anniversary the firm has the pleasure of inviting you to the cocktail party that will open the exhibition of the works of the French artist Auguste Rodin Venue Pinacoteca do Estado de So Paulo Praa da Luz No So Paulo SP Brazil Date September Time pm Business Attire This invitation is personal and nontransferable and entitles you to bring a guest Please show it upon arrival at the reception RSVP Please confirm your presence by email or send the form below by fax to Please send the filled out form by fax to I will attend the event I will bring a guest I will not attend the event Name Company Telephone Email rodinbottomgif Sponsored by Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva Advogados Telefnica and Banco Safra
